ONE_LINE_DOCTRINE: Alpha speaks first. Measurement verifies. Instruments listen. Capital waits.

LAYER_1_SIGNAL.name: SIGNAL LAYER - Truth Discovery
what_happens: Market state classified as STRESS @ 99%+ (EQUITY only)
Signal is inverted by design (contrarian alpha)
Quality measured by Inverted Brier only

LAYER_2_LEDGER.name: LEDGER LAYER - Economic Truth (Shadow)
what_happens: Direction evaluated at t+1 / t+3 / t+5
LAYER_2_LEDGER.purpose: Prove that the system is right before asking how much money it can make.

LAYER_3_INSTRUMENT.name: INSTRUMENT LAYER - Preparation Only
what_happens: Study options as instruments, not as trades
Map signal properties to instrument properties
LAYER_3_INSTRUMENT.validation: Validate compatibility with broker constraints (e.g. Alpaca)

AUTHORITY_FLOW.constraint: No upward influence permitted. Execution never informs truth.

WHY_THIS_MATTERS: Prevents execution skill from masking signal decay
Prevents clever instruments from faking alpha
Makes the paper-trading decision trivial and defensible
Scales cleanly to: Options, Other derivatives, Other asset classes (later)

GOVERNANCE.cross_layer_rule: Each layer protects the one above it from contamination
